name: julekalender-monorepo
description: Monorepo containing React frontend, .NET backend, and Sanity Studio

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:studio"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:studio
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/frontend && npm install && cd ../studio && npm install
